item.title: CVE-2024-35714|2024-06-08T13:35:25.222Z -- theme%20freesia -- idyllic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme Freesia Idyllic allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Idyllic: from n/a through 1.1.8.
